question: You will be able to view the weather forecast for the next _____ days, on the Kisan Suvidha app.
explanation: The Correct Answer is 5

question: What do the fine lines around the forecast line represent?
options: The range in which 95% of future data points are expected to be
The period for which predictions are displayed
explanation: The Correct Answer is Lower and upper confidence boundaries

question: Which web address takes you to the website for the National Digital Library of India?
explanation: The Correct Answer is ndl.iitkgp.ac.in

question: All Indian citizens between the age of 18 to 70 years are eligible for the Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bhima Yojana.
explanation: The Correct Answer is TRUE

question: The Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana offers a cover in case of accidental death or permanent disability of the eyes or limbs.
explanation: The Correct Answer is TRUE

question: What is the cover provided by the Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana?
explanation: The Correct Answer is 1 to 2 lakhs

question: How many numbers does the Rakshak app send an SMS to, in case of an emergency?
explanation: The Correct Answer is 4

question: Which app helps to protect women and senior citizens in India?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Rakshak app

question: Which web address is for the PMMY website?
explanation: The Correct Answer is www.mudra.org.in

question: The Mudra loan applicant should not be ___________ with any financial institution.
explanation: The Correct Answer is a defaulter

question: What is Pradhanmantri Awas Yojana?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Housing Sheme

question: Which of the following does not include in the process of application of Toilet Certificate on Aaple Sarkar website?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Biometric

question: Which web address is for the PMMY website?
explanation: The Correct Answer is www.mudra.org.in

question: Select the website that you must visit to apply for an Age Nationality and Domicile Certificate.
explanation: The Correct Answer is www.aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in

question: You have successfully registered on the website to apply for an Age Nationality Domicile Certificate. Which sub department will you have to select now, to apply for the same?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Revenue Services

question: After logging into your account at the aaplesarkar website, click on the option ________________ to apply for your Marriage Registration Certificate.
options: Rural Development and Panchayat Raj Department
Social Justice and Special Assistance Department
explanation: The Correct Answer is Rural Development and Panchayat Raj Department

question: Which option must you choose from the Rural Development Department's list of certificates, in order to apply for the Marriage Registration Ceritificate?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Marriage Certificate

question: The activation link for your LPG account verification is sent to your __________.
explanation: The Correct Answer is email id

question: The __________ portal provides LPG-related services such as registering for new connections and giving up LPG subsidies.
explanation: The Correct Answer is My LPG

question: Its been two days that you have sent Rakhi to your brother through post. You want to track the delivery status of your package. Which option will you choose to do so?
explanation: The Correct Answer is ePost Office

question: What is the use of the highlighted feature on the MGNREGA website?
options: To view the details of work and payment
To avail work facility anywhere in India
To withdraw the received work payment
explanation: The Correct Answer is To view the details of work and payment

question: What is Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act(MGNREGA)?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Employment scheme for rurals

question: You should click on the __________ option in the Kisan Suvidha app to view the list of advisors in your area.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Agro Advisory

question: Ravi uses mKisan App for accessing farming related information. What kind of information won't be accessible using this App?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Farmer's Aadhar Card

question: The URL to open the Self4Society platform is ________________.
explanation: The Correct Answer is www.self4society.mygov.in

question: Which tab do you have to click on, if you want to volunteer in a group, as part of an organization?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Organisation Volunteer

question: Which of the following portals is the right one to report a crime that you suspect is happening in your village?
options: Crime and Criminal Tracking Network & Systems
explanation: The Correct Answer is Crime and Criminal Tracking Network & Systems

question: When you submit a feedback on CCTNS, who will be responsible for looking into it?
explanation: The Correct Answer is The respective police station

question: Riya uses icons to open apps, but her friend types long commands. What’s the key difference?
options: Her friend’s system has advanced graphics
Riya’s system uses a Graphical User Interface
Both systems work the same way
explanation: The Correct Answer is Riya’s system uses a Graphical User Interface

question: Ajay opens a folder but sees mixed-up file names. What helps him organize?
options: Store all files on the desktop
explanation: The Correct Answer is Rename and arrange using folders

question: Suresh connects a USB printer, and it works instantly. What makes this possible?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Auto-detection feature of OS

question: Tina’s smartphone behaves differently than her laptop. Why?
options: Mobile OS and Desktop OS are different
explanation: The Correct Answer is Mobile OS and Desktop OS are different

question: Rahul prefers fewer permissions when installing apps. Which OS suits him?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Android

question: Priya is buying a tablet and wants to use mobile banking apps. Which OS should she choose if she prefers flexibility and lower cost?
options: Android because it allows flexibility and is widely available
iOS because it has no bugs
Android because it works only on old phones
explanation: The Correct Answer is Android because it allows flexibility and is widely available

question: Nisha installs apps from outside the Play Store on her Android phone. What should she evaluate before doing this?
options: If the app has colorful icons
The safety and permissions of the app
explanation: The Correct Answer is The safety and permissions of the app

question: Leela wants to use her computer only for printing and browsing. Which OS should she install?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Standalone OS

question: Kunal’s phone offers frequent security updates managed by company. What does this suggest?
explanation: The Correct Answer is He is using iOS

question: Print Priview option is available on __________ Tab
explanation: The Correct Answer is File

question: How to open a blank sheet ?
options: Click on File Tab > New > Blank Sheet
Click on File Tab > New > sheet
Click on File Tab > Open > Blank Sheet
Click on File Tab > New > Info
explanation: The Correct Answer is Click on File Tab > New > Blank Sheet

question: How you will save the document? Click on correct tab?
explanation: The Correct Answer is File

question: We can export the document in PDF form ?
explanation: The Correct Answer is TRUE

question: Which of these page sizes is not available in Microsoft Excel?
explanation: The Correct Answer is A2

question: Which group you will select To clear the format & apply font style?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Editing Group & Font Group

question: Wrap Text is a feature that __________ all information in a cell, even if it overflows the cell boundary.
explanation: The Correct Answer is shows

question: To change the number format, click on __________ tab from format cells.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Number

question: To change the font size of the text we can click on __________ Tab & __________ Group
explanation: The Correct Answer is Home > Font

question: You need to apply font style to your text. Which steps you will follow?
options: Home > Font > Font style > Select the style
explanation: The Correct Answer is Home > Font > Font style > Select the style

question: A student wants to design posters on a desktop. Which OS is best?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Linux (Desktop version)

question: Sneha wants to use PowerPoint from her mobile on a projector. What may limit her?
options: Mobile OS may not support it fully
explanation: The Correct Answer is Mobile OS may not support it fully

question: You see a person use Android for calls and Windows for typing. What does this show?
options: Both OS can be used for calling
explanation: The Correct Answer is Different OS serve different needs
